attributes.action: Ban lqtbq+ learning in schools and in the households
attributes.additional_details: because it is not appropriate for children to be learning about such things as they are still young and cannot grasp the concept of these things so they will merely accept them because they aren't able to make healthy decisions for themselves
attributes.background: to not teach LGBTQIA's+ in schools as it's not appropriate for young minds

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646173
